title: Romantic single-page website for Areebuu (React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui)

requirements.summary: Write cohesive romantic, apology-style single-page content addressed to “Areebuu” including the required nicknames, in English.
acceptanceCriteria: The page content includes the exact strings: “Areebuu”, “Linnuu”, “cutie potato”, and “kuchhuu puchhu”.
All user-facing text on the page is in English.
The page reads as a cohesive romantic/special gesture (headline + short message at minimum).

file_operations.description: Create the single-page React view and author the romantic apology copy in English, prominently including the exact nickname strings “Areebuu”, “Linnuu”, “cutie potato”, and “kuchhuu puchhu”. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card, Dialog) to present the message with consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add at least two lightweight interactive elements that work on desktop and mobile without login/backend calls.
acceptanceCriteria: There are at least two distinct interactive UI elements (beyond basic scrolling).
Interactions work on both desktop and mobile sizes.
Interactions do not require login or backend calls.

file_operations.description: Implement at least two distinct on-page interactions such as: (1) a “Reveal a message” interaction (collapsible/reveal card) and (2) a “Forgive me?” choice that always results in a kind outcome (e.g., opening a friendly modal). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button + Card for reveal, Dialog for outcomes) and Tailwind animations for a lightweight ‘special’ feel; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive, distinctive romantic visual theme (not predominantly blue/purple) across the page.
acceptanceCriteria: The page uses a consistent design system (palette + typography + spacing) across the full page.
The overall theme is not predominantly blue/purple.
Buttons, cards, and headings share consistent styling.

file_operations.description: Create global styling and Tailwind/shadcn token variables to establish a warm romantic theme (e.g., rose/peach/cream/gold tones, not predominantly blue/purple), consistent typography, spacing, and shared button/card/heading styling across the page.

Align section layouts and shadcn-ui component variants/classes to the new romantic theme (consistent headings, card styling, and button styles) while keeping all user-facing text English; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build a simple single-page layout with at least 4 distinct sections and an interactive closing CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: The page contains at least 4 visually distinct sections.
The hero section includes “Areebuu” in a prominent headline.
The closing section includes a clear call-to-action element (button/link) that triggers an on-page interaction (modal/scroll/reveal), not external navigation.

file_operations.description: Structure the page into at least 4 clear sections: Hero (prominent headline including “Areebuu”), Message section, “Little things I love about you” section (cards/list), and a Closing section with a CTA button that triggers an on-page interaction (e.g., opens a shadcn-ui Dialog or scrolls to a reveal section). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add required generated images as static assets and render them in the UI without backend serving.
acceptanceCriteria: All generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The page loads and displays the generated images in the UI.
No backend endpoints are used to fetch or transform the images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static asset image file at frontend/public/assets/generated/romantic-bg.dim_1920x1080.png for the romantic background.
Add the generated static asset image file at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-illustration.dim_1200x800.png for the hero illustration.
Add the generated static asset image file at frontend/public/assets/generated/heart-icons.dim_256x256.png to use as small decorative elements.

Render the generated images in the page UI: use frontend/public/assets/generated/romantic-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as a background/section backdrop, place frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-illustration.dim_1200x800.png in the hero, and incorporate frontend/public/assets/generated/heart-icons.dim_256x256.png as decorative accents within sections. Ensure images are referenced as static public assets and not fetched/transformed via any backend calls.
